name: Samharden.GitHub.io
body:
### Sam Harden's Github Repo Page.
.

### About Me:
I'm an attorney in Tampa Florida, representing people accused of crimes. I'm Of-Counsel at [Metcalf Harden P.A.](http://hillsboroughdefense.com). You can read about my criminal defense philosophy [here](http://hillsboroughdefense.com/the-worst-of-us/). You can follow me on Twitter here: [@samuelharden](https://twitter.com/samuelharden).
 

### Current Projects:
I'm the founder and 'Jack of all Trades' at [MyCourtCase.org](http://www.mycourtcase.org), a website that gives average people the ability to see the results of hundreds of thousands of past criminal cases like theirs, and make an informed decision about what to do in their case. 

 I've also been working to put Florida's court forms online in an easy-to-use format, starting with Florida's mental health forms. Here's the [Baker Act Peition](https://samharden.github.io/florida_baker_act_petition.html)  

### Contact:
If you want to contact me the best way is via email at samharden@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
